template.template: Template SNMP HP for Linux Active Mode
template.name: Template SNMP HP for Linux Active Mode

item.host: Template SNMP HP for Linux Active Mode

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template SNMP HP for Linux Active Mode:DiskState.[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}<>2
trigger_prototype.name: Server {HOST.NAME} Physical Disk {#DISKNAME} not OK

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template SNMP HP for Linux Active Mode:MemStatus.[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}<>0
trigger_prototype.name: Server {HOST.NAME} Problem with memory in slot {#MEM}

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template SNMP HP for Linux Active Mode:RCStatus.[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}<>2
trigger_prototype.name: Server {HOST.NAME} RaidController {#RCNAME} not OK

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP HP for Linux Active Mode:custom.hp.ld.status.last()}<>3
trigger.name: RAID LogicDrive Error

item.host: Template SNMP HP for Linux Active Mode
Template SNMP HP for Linux Active Mode
